publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4460 Linda Fabiani: Greentrax—That the Parliament congratulates Greentrax Recordings, "Scotland’s Favourite Record Company", on its 20th anniversary; welcomes the recognition of founder, Ian Green, by the academic board of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama in its award to him of the honorary degree of Doctor of Music; thanks Ian Green and all at Greentrax Recordings for their work in the preservation and promotion of Scottish traditional music and contribution to our nation’s culture, and looks forward to many more years of great music.
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Michael Matheson*

S2M-4460 Linda Fabiani: Greentrax—That the Parliament congratulates Greentrax Recordings, "Scotland’s Favourite Record Company", on its 20th anniversary; welcomes the recognition of founder, Ian Green, by the academic board of the Royal Scottish Academy of Music and Drama in its award to him of the honorary degree of Doctor of Music; thanks Ian Green and all at Greentrax Recordings for their work in the preservation and promotion of Scottish traditional music and contribution to our nation’s culture, and looks forward to many more years of great music. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Shiona Baird*, Mr Jamie Stone*, Bruce Crawford*, Pauline McNeill*

S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Rob Gibson*, Jim Mather*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Jim Wallace*, Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*, Ms Maureen Watt*, Eleanor Scott*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Frank McAveety*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Robin Harper*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Dave Petrie*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Frances Curran*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Alex Fergusson*, Mark Ballard*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Karen Whitefield*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Richard Lochhead*, Chris Ballance*
S2M-4460 Greentrax (lodged on 30 May 2006) Mr Andrew Welsh*
